description: This Dart source file defines the 'Env' class for loading and accessing environment variables, primarily for configuration purposes such as API URLs and timeouts, using the flutter_dotenv package.

classes.name: Env
classes.description: A utility class for loading and providing access to environment variables needed for app configuration.

methods.name: apiBaseUrl
methods.description: Getter for the API base URL, returns value from environment variable or default.

methods.name: apiTimeout
methods.description: Getter for the API timeout duration in seconds, returns value from environment variable or default.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronous method to load environment variables from the .env file; should be called before app startup.
